0110010111011010 0101000111101001 0 -> sum: 1011011111000011, cout: 0
0101011000111000 0100000011111100 0 -> sum: 1001011100110100, cout: 0
1000011010000000 1110001011100000 0 -> sum: 0110100101100000, cout: 1
0110101011110110 1101000101101001 1 -> sum: 0011110001100000, cout: 1
1100100101010001 0110100001011101 1 -> sum: 0011000110101111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
